name: Coney Island Skatepark
description: Boardwalk-adjacent skatepark with ocean views. Skate, then hit the beach or grab a Nathan's dog.
history: Opened as part of Coney Island's revitalization. Brings together the beach culture and skate scene perfectly.
bestTimes: Summer mornings — skate before the beach crowds arrive. Off-season is empty paradise.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include bowl, mini ramp, rails, ledges, fun box. Well-maintained concrete construction.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Brooklyn skate scene in Coney Island. Opened as part of Coney Island's revitalization. Brings together the beach culture and skate scene perfectly.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: D/F/N/Q to Coney Island-Stillwell Ave.. Summer mornings — skate before the beach crowds arrive. Off-season is empty paradise.
detailedNotes.warnings: Public skatepark — standard park etiquette applies.
